page.title: 09TRANSPORT IN EASSIE
page.content: The main A94 Trunk road from Perth to Aberdeen runs through our area.One bus per day runs in each direction. This shortage of public transport makes car ownership almost essential. We found in a survey that 81% of households owned at least one car. The railway line from Perth to Aberdeen which ran through our area was lifted about two years ago. A large percentage of households (75%) have a telephone. Our school has a large catchment area and many pupils have long distances to travel to school.A mini-bus is provided by the education authorities to transport us to and from school.
